name: Dark Doriado
effectText: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can choose 4 monsters from your Deck (1 EARTH, 1 WATER, 1 FIRE, and 1 WIND), then place them on top of the Deck in any order.
pendEffect: All EARTH, WATER, FIRE, and WIND monsters you control gain 200 ATK/DEF for every different Attribute among the monsters you control.
